text: Virgil Hugo "Buck" Batterman (April 1, 1918 – January 5, 1999) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Oshkosh All-Stars in the National Basketball League and averaged 1.2 points per game. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1999 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Wisconsin Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Oshkosh All-Stars players Category:Sportspeople from Oshkosh, Wisconsin Category:Wisconsin–Oshkosh Titans men's basketball players
title: Buck Batterman
